description: The Chair - Andrew Fitch gets tied down to the chair as he receives the crop on his torso. Clothespins are attached all over his balls, pinching hard as his cropping continues. The Water Chamber - His hands bound above his head, Andrew receives the cane all over his torso and endures water torment. After he's exhausted from the day, Andrew is made to blow his load. title: Straight Stud - The Chair - The Pit - The Water Chamber
